statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123456789';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND receiver_address LIKE '%abc%';
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123abc'
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, transaction_date FROM cryptocurrency_transactions LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE receiver_address LIKE '%xyz%'
SELECT sender_address, SUM(amount) AS total_sent_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY sender_address HAVING total_sent_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_sent_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT authority_name, contact_email FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE authority_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_wallet_address, amount, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE country = 'USA' AND authority_name LIKE 'SEC%';
SELECT receiver_wallet_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT authority_name, country, contact_email FROM regulatory_authorities ORDER BY country, authority_name;
SELECT sender_wallet_address AS sender, receiver_wallet_address AS receiver, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, recipient_address FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA';
SELECT agency_name, jurisdiction FROM regulatory_agencies ORDER BY agency_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address LIKE '1%' AND recipient_address LIKE '3%';

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, a.agency_name FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t JOIN transaction_analysis ta ON t.transaction_id = ta.transaction_id JOIN regulatory_agencies a ON ta.regulatory_agency_id = a.agency_id WHERE ta.compliance_status = 1 AND a.jurisdiction = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE jurisdiction = 'Europe' ORDER BY agency_name ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, ta.analysis_date FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t JOIN transaction_analysis ta ON t.transaction_id = ta.transaction_id WHERE ta.compliance_status = 0 ORDER BY ta.analysis_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT account_name, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, country FROM users WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, description, effective_date FROM regulations WHERE regulator = 'FCA' ORDER BY effective_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT user_id, username, email, country FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, country FROM users;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallets ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, reason, date_added FROM sanctions_list WHERE reason = 'Fraud';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE country = 'Canada';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE country = 'UK' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallets WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
